blogPost.title: What will the impact of AI be on the marketing industry? Answer by @ElenaMMelnikova, CMO @Talkwalker. https://t.co/vvb6JSH13z https://t.co/5Z0SNnvh78
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: AIはマーケティング業界にどのような影響を与えるのでしょうか？Answer by @ElenaMMelnikova, CMO @Talkwalker. https://t.co/vvb6JSH13z https://t.co/5Z0SNnvh78
人工智能对营销行业的影响将是什么？回答者：@ElenaMMelnikova，CMO @Talkwalker。https://t.co/vvb6JSH13z https://t.co/5Z0SNnvh78
人工智能對營銷行業的影響將是什麼？回答者：@ElenaMMelnikova，CMO @Talkwalker。https://t.co/vvb6JSH13z https://t.co/5Z0SNnvh78

previous.title: How can people just starting to build their credit and wealth use technology to create good money habits? Answer by Poulomi Damany, General Manager of Assets at Credit Karma. https://t.co/X1r6T4QG8P https://t.co/qAWwd5EqIg

localize.full_text: 信用と富を築き始めたばかりの人々が、テクノロジーを利用して良いお金の習慣を作るにはどうしたらいいでしょうか？回答：Poulomi Damany, General Manager of Assets at Credit Karma. https://t.co/X1r6T4QG8P https://t.co/qAWwd5EqIg
刚开始建立信用和财富的人如何利用技术来建立良好的金钱习惯？回答者：Poulomi Damany，Credit Karma的资产部总经理。https://t.co/X1r6T4QG8P https://t.co/qAWwd5EqIg
剛開始建立信用和財富的人如何利用技術來建立良好的金錢習慣？回答者：Poulomi Damany，Credit Karma的資產部總經理。https://t.co/X1r6T4QG8P https://t.co/qAWwd5EqIg

next.title: What are some aspects of startups that people would be surprised to know? Answer by @danshapiro, CEO of @glowforge, author "Hot Seat: Startup CEO Guidebook". https://t.co/sHnhBZBHiT https://t.co/zeXhKBBxQN

localize.full_text: スタートアップの人たちが意外と知っているであろう点は何でしょうか？Hot Seat: Startup CEO Guidebook』の著者である@glowforgeのCEO、@danshapiro氏による回答です。https://t.co/sHnhBZBHiT https://t.co/zeXhKBBxQN
初创企业有哪些方面是人们会感到惊讶的？回答者：@danshapiro，@glowforge的首席执行官，《热座：创业公司CEO指南》的作者。https://t.co/sHnhBZBHiT https://t.co/zeXhKBBxQN
初創企業有哪些方面是人們會感到驚訝的？回答者：@danshapiro，@glowforge的首席執行官，《熱座：創業公司CEO指南》的作者。https://t.co/sHnhBZBHiT https://t.co/zeXhKBBxQN
